General.Name: UpSnap Inc
General.Description: UpSnap, Inc. provides mobile advertising and direct mail solutions in the United States and internationally. The company offers advertising solutions for small businesses, including video ads, social media ads, and digitally retargeted direct mail ads. It also engages in the licensing and support of its software solutions, as well as sale and service of software solutions. The company was formerly known as VoodooVox Inc. and changed its name to UpSnap, Inc. in July 2014. UpSnap, Inc. is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 100 Consilium Place, Toronto, ON, Canada, M1H 3E3
